column1: Smoque BBQ////We ordered the pulled pork and brisket platters. Both were very tender and flavorful. The portions are not big
column2: but keep in mind that the flavor itself is enough to satisfy hunger. Fries were decent as was the mac & cheese. The beans were a bit too sweet for me
column4: it's just preference. The coleslaw was really nothing to write home about
column5: but it seemed like a healthier option over the usual cream based.
